meanings.definition: To provide financial support for a project or initiative alongside another party.
meanings.sent1: We will cofinance the new community center with the local government.
meanings.sent2: The two companies decided to cofinance the research project together.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors agreed to cofinance the block party for a fun time.
meanings.sent4: Their partnership was like cofinancing a journey to success.
meanings.sent5: Cofinancing made the dream project a reality for everyone involved.

meanings.definition: The act of sharing the cost of a project with another party.
meanings.sent1: Cofinance is essential for large infrastructure developments.
meanings.sent2: The cofinance agreement helped both organizations achieve their goals.
meanings.sent3: The cofinance arrangement turned budgeting into a team effort.
meanings.sent4: In business, cofinance can lead to stronger collaborations.
meanings.sent5: The success of the project relied on effective cofinance strategies.
